description: five similar drawings, each with blended graphite square at center; squares lighten from dark (a) to light (e); each drawing on square white paper
inscription: across bottom edge verso of each drawing, graphite: Gloria Ortiz-Hernández, Continuum, III 2004, series of 5 drawings, each sheet 13 3/4 x 13 3/4\" (35cm) Pencil on paper [1-5] of 5
portfolio: From Untitled set of five drawings
signed: C verso of each sheet, graphite: GOrtizH © 2004 / Continuum, III / [1-5] of 5
title: Continuum, III
